page.title: 11A week day morning
page.content: I wake up at about 7 a.m. and turn on my radio to listen to Radio 1. My favourite group is called Wham. My Mum calls me and I can hear my dad listening to the Today Programme on Radio 4. My little sister has gone downstairs to see if Roland Rat is on breakfast television. I dress myself in my school uniform (I hate it!) and put on my pixie boots in the vain hope that mum will let me wear them to school. I eat my breakfast which consists of Weetabix (a wheat-based biscuit in a rectangular shape) drenched with low- fat milk - somebody's just written another boring report about food that isn't good for me soon I won't be able to eat anything - and frugally splattered with sugar (that's bad for me too!). I leave to walk to school which starts at 9. a.m.
